projects.title: Advanced Power Estimation using Traditional ML and Physics-Informed Neural Networks
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a real-time object detection model with 90% accuracy.
 - Utilized YOLOv4 for diverse object identification tasks.
 - Improved processing speed by optimizing TensorFlow and GPU usage.

projects.title: Deep Learning Handwriting Analytics
projects.bodyText:
- Created a handwriting recognition system with 92% character recognition accuracy.
 - Implemented LSTM networks for sequential data analysis.
 - Deployed the model using Flask with React frontend.

projects.title: Predictive Heart Attack Risk Analytics
projects.bodyText:
- Built a model predicting heart attack risks, reducing hospitalizations by 25%.
 - Applied Gradient Boosting and SHAP for interpretability.
 - Integrated with Tableau dashboards and a Django web application.

projects.title: Electric Vehicle Population Analytics
projects.bodyText:
- Analyzed EV adoption patterns, predicting a 30% increase in five years.
 - Used clustering and regression models on large datasets.
 - Visualized results through Power BI, supporting policy-making decisions.

projects.title: Boston Check Book Analytics
projects.bodyText:
- Conducted financial data analysis, improving budget efficiency by 15%.
 - Leveraged PySpark for big data processing and insights.
 - Created interactive Tableau dashboards, deployed via Django.
